original_text: This is the law of him in whom is the plague of leprosy, whose hand is not able to get that which pertaineth to his cleansing.
korean_text: 나병 환자로서 그 정결예식에 그의 힘이 미치지 못한 자의 규례가 그러하니라

sentences.original_text: This is the law of him
in whom is the plague of leprosy
whose hand is not able to get
that which pertaineth to his cleansing
